name: Batch
tasteNotes: 02-10-2020 18:10 cooled and served @ 7 C. Opening the swing-top gave a puff. Poured clear with a little yeast from conditioning. No foam, light carbonation. A light sour taste, boozy, some light esters and dry mouthfeel.
